Item.sqlserver_body: CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [IX_Activity_assignment_source_id_is_disabled_related_id] ON [innovator].[ACTIVITY_ASSIGNMENT] ( [SOURCE_ID] ASC, [IS_DISABLED] ASC ) INCLUDE ( [RELATED_ID], [ESCALATE_TO], [FOR_ALL_MEMBERS], [VOTING_WEIGHT] ) WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF, DROP_EXISTING = OFF, ONLINE = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON)
Item.name: IX_Activity_assignment_source_id_is_disabled_related_id
